title: Implement Meta API read tool
description:
Implement get_ad_data_from_meta() function with OAuth.

## Pattern
```python
import httpx
from google.adk.tools import FunctionTool

META_API_VERSION = "v19.0"
META_BASE_URL = f"https://graph.facebook.com/{META_API_VERSION}"

async def get_ad_data_from_meta(
    access_token: str,
    account_id: str,
    days: int = 30
) -> Dict:
    async with httpx.AsyncClient() as client:
        response = await client.get(
            f"{META_BASE_URL}/act_{account_id}/insights",
            params={
                "access_token": access_token,
                "fields": "campaign_name,spend,impressions,clicks,ctr,cpc,actions",
                "date_preset": "last_30d",
                "level": "ad"
            }
        )
        return response.json()

meta_ad_data_tool = FunctionTool(func=get_ad_data_from_meta)
```
